meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Reggie Austin Alyson Murray Jerry Slowik Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6742.

td.p: Reggie Austin, an actor from Culver City, California
Alyson Murray, a server from Boston, Massachusetts
Jerry Slowik, a writer from Arlington Heights, Illinois (whose 3-day cash winnings total $71,900)

tr.td: CELEBRITIES' FAVORITE MOVIES
IT'S A GAS... GIANT
MY NAME IS MY BRAND
I'M IN...
"DE"
NILE

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Anchorman(: The Legend of Ron Burgundy)

Alyson
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(I\'m Chuck Todd of NBC News.) The longer I am in television, the more I like this feature film comedy with Will Ferrell as a San Diego newsman, & I\'m really looking forward to the sequel')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (I'm Chuck Todd of NBC News.) The longer I am in television, the more I like this feature film comedy with Will Ferrell as a San Diego newsman, & I'm really looking forward to the sequel

tr.td: It's the giantest gas giant planet

tr.td: He got rich running a fertilizer co. before becoming a bowtie-wearing popcorn king (& it's not Samuel Jiffypop)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_4_1', 'clue_J_4_1_stuck', '(Jerry: What is hypothermia?)

shock

Jerry
Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(Reggie: What is blue and red?)

the blue (Nile) and white (Nile)

JerryReggie
')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: They're the Nile's 2 "colorful" main tributaries

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_2', 'clue_J_1_2_stuck', '(Here with the clue are Mike & Mike of ESPN Radio.) My favorite sports movie is "Field of Dreams"--it\'s got everything: mystery, romance & baseball...
...I can beat that--my favorite is this laughter on the links that co-starred Bill Murray as a crazy gopher exterminator')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
(Here with the clue are Mike & Mike of ESPN Radio.) My favorite sports movie is "Field of Dreams"--it's got everything: mystery, romance & baseball...
...I can beat that--my favorite is this laughter on the links that co-starred Bill Murray as a crazy gopher exterminator

toggle('clue_J_3_2', 'clue_J_3_2_stuck', '(Jerry: What is Scholls?)
...
(Alex: Jerry, you added an "S".)

Scholl

JerryAlyson
')

protective

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_4', 'clue_J_1_4_stuck', '(Jerry: What is Dr. Strangelove or How I Learned to Stop Worrying About the Bomb?)
...
(Alex: [To Jerry] Yeah, if you\'d left it at Dr. Strangelove, I think [*] was the title.)

Dr. Strangelove (or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb)

JerryReggie
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_4', 'clue_J_1_4_stuck', '(Hi, I\'m Harry Shearer.) The Cuban missile crisis was still fresh in viewers\' minds when Stanley Kubrick played the situation for laughs in this 1964 classic')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

toggle('clue_J_2_4', 'clue_J_2_4_stuck', '(Alex: Just because you said it a few moments ago is no reason not to say it again, Reggie, [*], yes.)

Uranus

Triple Stumper
')

Paul Revere

Reggie
')

Alyson
Reggie
SONGS FOR NEW YEAR'S
